Reviews.Title: “Good place for reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Tanitka
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights looked expensive bb spend weekend berlin nice breakfast simple adequate staff speaks german russian little english pension located charlottenburg district 15 minutes walking ubahn station busstop 100 meters buses zoo ubahn station 2 supermarkets front hotel restaurants shopping street 2 blocks recommend

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: Judi M
Reviews.Content: pension booking spring started complete nightmare hotel dreadful dirty service nonexistent refuse cancellations friends mine joining party wished cancel reservations learned dreadful hotel refused refund simply lost money reported authorities believe behaviour accordance rules laid hotel operators berlin fellow travellers money paid filthy disappointed pictures net extremely misleading

Reviews.Title: “cheap”

Reviews.Content: spent time hotel stayed berlin huge exhibition difficult free berlin expecially close exhibition found pension inexpensive nights remember heating hot water remember doors proper enjoy smoke comming door neighboor

Reviews.Title: “good choice for walk-in guests, good rates”
Reviews.Author: fab10lau
Reviews.Content: staid night found friendly helpful staff speak english hotel ok special located building shared private houses west berlin opinion district berlin charlottenburg underground station nearby walking distance breakfast wide choice terms costs pretty warm heating appreciated averages berlin temperatures

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Calm, Oldish Style, valuable as an one star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: PePa23
Reviews.Content: travelled 6 europe countries wife little time booking hotel berlin confused finding suitable stay calm clean priceless location thank god hotel website choosed arrived wife soninlaw shocked little wasted money inside checked arrived atmosphere absorbed grandmothers memories hotel calm clean stylish etc liked little city center availability public transportation time memories

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience, Recomended”
Reviews.Author: Alialexie
Reviews.Content: 3 looking cheap minute found unexpectedly clean cozy worth money breakfast bathrooms renovated comfortable beds hotel brought nostalgic feeling reminding home enjoyed definitely recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Pension Messe
